parameter.name: ApplicationPath
parameter.description: Full site path where you would like to install your application (i.e., PloneApp)

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Enter a password for the 'admin' user.

parameter.name: zeo_port
parameter.description: If set, a ZEO service will be installed and the Zope instance(s) will connect to it. If the value is an integer, the ZEO service will listen on that port. If the value is 'auto' then the last digits of '8100' will be replaced by the number suffix of the installed app. If not set, a standalon Zope instance will be created.

parameter.name: clients
parameter.description: Use with the 'zeo' install method to specify the number of Zope clients you wish to create. Default is 1.

parameter.name: develop
parameter.description: If `True`, include include various development tools.
